meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>decide</kanji> with your <kanji>self</kanji>, that is your own decision. That comes from you. That comes from your <vocabulary>self determination</vocabulary>. But the word is mainly used in Japan as a euphemism for <vocabulary>suicide</vocabulary>. It's kind of important that you know that.

This word is very formal and generally used in historical contexts, such as referencing suicides that occurred during wartime.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
